snippet: Hundreds of people have also been reported missing since a tropical cyclone hit Somalia’s semiautonomous Puntland region over the weekend, the government said.
abstract: Somalian government says tropical cyclone that hit the semiautonomous Puntland region killed at least 100 people; declares a state of emergency and appeals for international aid.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of people have also been reported missing since a tropical cyclone hit Somalia’s semiautonomous Puntland region over the weekend, the government said.
